debuffs.name: Heap's Collapse
debuffs.description: One grain of weakness means nothing. But grain by grain, imperceptibly, you've ceased to be a heap of power at all.

debuffs.name: Curry's Corruption
debuffs.description: If this poison harms you, then it spreads. The conditional is vacuously true. The conclusion is inevitably, recursively toxic.

debuffs.name: Yablo's Venom
debuffs.description: Each moment of pain refers to the next: 'All pain after this will be worse.' No self-reference, yet infinitely escalating agony.

debuffs.name: Theseus' Dissolution
debuffs.description: Plank by plank, your ship comes apart. Drop by drop, you become less yourself. When does the bleeding stop being you?

debuffs.name: Olbers' Fire
debuffs.description: If infinite stars fill the sky, why is it dark? Because their light is delayed. When it arrives all at once—you burn in accumulated radiance.

debuffs.name: Boltzmann's Chill
debuffs.description: Random fluctuations conspire against you—entropy arranges itself into impossible cold. Your movements slow toward heat death.

debuffs.name: Hardy's Discharge
debuffs.description: Two particles that should never meet—do. The impossible measurement occurs. Reality contradicts itself through your nervous system.

debuffs.name: Grelling's Malediction
debuffs.description: This curse is heterological—it does not describe itself. But then it does describe itself. The contradiction festers in your soul.

debuffs.name: Inspection Sickness
debuffs.description: You randomly sampled this moment—but longer illnesses are more likely to be sampled. Your disease will last longer than average, paradoxically.

debuffs.name: Berry's Injury
debuffs.description: The smallest wound not describable in fewer than eleven words. By describing it, we've created it. Definability becomes damage.

debuffs.name: Buridan's Paralysis
debuffs.description: Like the ass between two hay bales, you cannot choose. Perfect rationality demands sufficient reason—and you have none. You stand frozen.

debuffs.name: Sleeping Beauty's Rest
debuffs.description: You wake, uncertain if this is Monday or Tuesday—or if the coin landed heads. Unable to resolve your credence, you drift back to unconsciousness.

debuffs.name: Simpson's Confusion
debuffs.description: Each part of your thinking is superior, yet combined they're inferior. Your mind's aggregation betrays its components.

debuffs.name: Zeno's Stillness
debuffs.description: To move, you must first move half the distance. Then half again. Infinite steps in finite time—but your muscles refuse the mathematics.

debuffs.name: Grandfather's Terror
debuffs.description: You see the paradox of your own destruction—if you fight, you ensure your doom; if you flee, you ensure your doom. Either path leads backward to oblivion.

debuffs.name: Wigner's Friendship
debuffs.description: From your perspective, your reality has collapsed into serving them. From outside, you remain in superposition. Neither view is wrong. You obey.

debuffs.name: Two Envelope Delirium
debuffs.description: Should you switch? The other choice always seems better. You switch targets, switch tactics, switch again—always certain switching helps, always wrong.

debuffs.name: Quantum Erasure
debuffs.description: Information about your target has been erased from reality itself. You know they exist; you cannot know where. Observation fails.

debuffs.name: Moore's Muteness
debuffs.description: You believe you can speak, yet you don't believe you're speaking. The absurdity freezes your voice. Assertion becomes impossible.

debuffs.name: Problem of Evil
debuffs.description: If you are all-powerful, why do you suffer? If all-knowing, why not prevent it? Your rage at the paradox consumes reason—omnipotent fury, impotent wisdom.

debuffs.name: Preface Exhaustion
debuffs.description: You believe each action you take is correct. You also believe some of your actions must be mistakes. The inconsistency drains you.

debuffs.name: Lottery Despair
debuffs.description: For each effort, you rationally believe it will fail. Combined, you believe nothing will succeed. Yet something must. The contradiction exhausts you.

debuffs.name: Achilles' Burden
debuffs.description: You are Achilles—faster than any tortoise. Yet the tortoise is always ahead. No matter how swiftly you act, you're always one step behind.

debuffs.name: Braess Binding
debuffs.description: Adding options makes things worse. You could move, but seeing the paths available creates congestion in your muscles. Paralysis through possibility.

debuffs.name: Ross-Littlewood Fall
debuffs.description: At noon, how many balls remain? Your stance is like the paradox—adding and removing faster and faster until at the limit, nothing coherent remains.

debuffs.name: Richard's Exposure
debuffs.description: Your physical defenses are defined in terms of themselves—a diagonal contradiction. The enumeration reveals your weakness; Body attacks pierce deeply.

debuffs.name: Cantor's Gap
debuffs.description: Your mental defenses are countably infinite—impressive, until you face uncountable assault. There's always a larger infinity of thoughts to break you.

debuffs.name: Burali-Forti Wound
debuffs.description: Your emotional ordinals exceed their own bounds. The set of all your feelings contains a feeling greater than all feelings. Your Heart tears itself apart.

debuffs.name: Raven's Target
debuffs.description: Evidence confirms equivalent hypotheses. A green apple confirms all ravens are black—and confirms you are the target. Everything points to you.

debuffs.name: Omnipotence Failure
debuffs.description: Can you create a blow so powerful you cannot throw it? The paradox resolves: no. Your physical might crumbles under logical contradiction.

debuffs.name: GHZ Collapse
debuffs.description: Your thoughts were entangled in perfect correlation—until measurement. Now local realism fails. Your Mind attacks scatter incoherently.

debuffs.name: Toxin Hesitation
debuffs.description: Intend to feel and you get rewarded—but you know you won't follow through. Unable to genuinely commit, your Heart attacks lack conviction.

debuffs.name: Dartboard Certainty
debuffs.description: Every point has zero probability of being hit—yet something is always hit. Probability zero doesn't mean impossible. You will be struck.

debuffs.name: Ellsberg's Doubt
debuffs.description: Known risks you could handle. Unknown probabilities paralyze. Your attacks carry ambiguous odds—and ambiguity breeds failure.

debuffs.name: Prisoner's Betrayal
debuffs.description: Rational self-interest dictates you defect—leave yourself exposed. Individual logic produces collective disaster. Your defenses abandon you.

debuffs.name: Skolem's Reduction
debuffs.description: Your infinite buffs are countable from outside. Enumerated, bounded, finite after all. The Löwenheim-Skolem theorem strips your power away.

debuffs.name: Allais' Curse
debuffs.description: Your allies' pain becomes yours—you violate expected utility by feeling their losses more than logic allows. Independence fails; harm transfers.

debuffs.name: Centipede's End
debuffs.description: Backward induction reveals the truth: at every step, you should have given up earlier. Your vitality unravels from the conclusion backward.

debuffs.name: Moral Blindness
debuffs.description: To learn what's right, you must recognize right when you see it. But to recognize it, you must already know it. Your ethical compass spins uselessly.

debuffs.name: Transformative Terror
debuffs.description: You cannot know what you'll become until you become it. But the decision must be made now, with values you won't keep. Identity fractures under impossible choice.

debuffs.name: Peer Doubt
debuffs.description: Your equal disagrees. You're both rational, both informed. Neither can claim superiority. Belief becomes impossible; action becomes paralysis.

debuffs.name: Straw Man's Echo
debuffs.description: A weakened version of your intent was easily dismissed. You never argued for that—but the damage is done. Your confidence wavers, just slightly.

debuffs.name: Post Hoc Tremor
debuffs.description: After the stumble came the strike—correlation mistaken for causation. Your muscles remember the sequence and flinch preemptively, just a little.

debuffs.name: Affirming the Consequent
debuffs.description: If you were skilled, you'd succeed. You succeeded—therefore you were skilled. But the reasoning was flawed, and your next attempt knows it.

debuffs.name: Emergence Failure
debuffs.description: Your consciousness should have causal power—but physics is causally closed. Your will is epiphenomenal, an illusion. Commands fail to reach your limbs.
